definition: clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie

sentences.english: Diehards refused to countenance the importance of aircraft .
sentences.chinese: 死硬派拒絕承認飛機的重要性。

sentences.english: " The hard-liners, he says, have learned "a very tough lesson.
sentences.chinese: “強硬派，他說，學會了”一個非常艱難的一課。

sentences.english: It was only the die-hards who stayed to see the end of the poor movie.
sentences.chinese: 只有那些死硬派纔有本事把這部爛片看完。

sentences.english: The first we'll call the hard-liners.
sentences.chinese: 我們將第一類稱爲強硬派。

sentences.english: Lately they've been getting into hard rock.
sentences.chinese: 近來他們一直熱衷於演奏硬派搖滾。

sentences.english: The social consequences could be disastrous, and could give political hard-liners a leg up.
sentences.chinese: 其社會後果可能是災難性的，同時會觸怒強硬派分子。

sentences.english: Do we have many hard-liners in this government?
sentences.chinese: 這個政府裏，有許多死硬派的人士嗎？

sentences.english: Snape seemed to be facing a constant, low level of mutiny from a hard core of students.
sentences.chinese: 斯內普要對付一幫死硬派學生持續不斷的低調反抗。

sentences.english: A few die-hards are trying to stop the reforms.
sentences.chinese: 一小撮死硬派企圖中止改革。

sentences.english: China- bashers have introduced a dozen bills in the new Congress.
sentences.chinese: “對華強硬派”議員已經向國會提交了十二分議案。

sentences.english: It is a pity, the Kuomintang hardliner destroyed this path finally.
sentences.chinese: 遺憾的是，國民黨強硬派最終破壞了這一道路。

sentences.english: And there is still the hardy minority that insists on viewing the Beatles as the great put-on of the century.
sentences.chinese: 還有一些少數強硬派認定披頭士是本世紀最大的騙子。

sentences.english: The Maoists froth at the extreme fringe of the hardline camp.
sentences.chinese: 毛主義分子在強硬派陣營的極端邊緣大喊大叫。

sentences.english: Lately they have been getting into hard rock.
sentences.chinese: 近來他們一直熱衷於演奏硬派搖滾。

sentences.english: now another tough-talking centre-right party has won in Portugal (see article).
sentences.chinese: 現在另外一箇中右的強硬派贏得了葡萄牙的大選。

sentences.english: Even the hardcore rock 'n' rollers know who Woody Guthrie was.
sentences.chinese: 即便是硬派搖滾歌手都知道伍迪加斯里是誰。

definition: sense of movement (often in a static work of art)/dynamic/vivid/lifelike
Mazda, Japanese car make (derived from name Matsuda 松田)/also known as 萬事得|万事得
exterior appearance/to view sth from the outside/exterior condition
